Talon:

"Maybe he's aluding the minion that Tucson captured" Said Talon


F=
rom: Kraftlos 
Sent: Monday, March 01, 2010 7:29 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  

"Prisoner?=
" Salveo said to himself, glancing at Lord Perseus who had just come inside=
 the command center.

"There is at least one Minion inside the base.  They =
might see our blocking of the entrance as imprisonment," offered Kenzo, who=
 was still standing by the CR chamber.

The chamber read "2 cycles remainin=
g".  Too much was happening too fast.  Who was this Maurader?  If only his =
databases were back online, but the surviving computers were still packed i=
n crates in the large room.

"Legacy, this is Lord Perseus," he said into t=
he radio.  "Ask Marauder who he is talking about.  We have no minion prison=
ers.  Maybe we can stall his attack."


  On Feb 24, 2010 6:43 PM, "Preston=
 Carroll" <supercyclonus@...> wrote:


  > With the power on, Salveo =
had gotten back on the control station and began programming the base's ...=


  Legacy paused as he accessed the situation and then spoke,
  "Affirmati=
ve, it is indeed a Unicronian that approaches. His energy
  signature most =
closely matches that of Marauder, a minion of immense
  power and ability."=
 Legacy paused once more before continuing, "I have
  conflicting reports o=
f him having at least 8 if not more forms."

  I am replaying his last tran=
smission, ""You have what is mine!" "You

  will release your minion captiv=
e, or you will be destroyed!"


  Meanwhile up above them Marauder continue=
d his approach . . .


  Giant wings beat the air lazily as he dropped out =
of the skies. His
  body was well defended, covered...

  (OOC: I reposted =
Maruader's last entrance description into the skies
  over the old Maximal =
base to keep it current.)

  Preston

  (Marauder)


  --------------------=
----------------

  Yahoo! Groups Links
